lyrics:
In the morning I can fix breakfast, baby
Get you ready for work
Let me be your housekeeper, girl
In the evening I can get your bath water ready
Show you what you're worth
Let me be your housekeeper, girl

How would you feel about it, lady
To be treated like a queen
I wouldn't hesitate to give you anything you need
Cook the dinner, wash the clothes, give you a bath before the sleep
I'm at your mercy, yeah, pretty lady, can't you see?

In the morning I can fix breakfast, baby
Get you ready for work
Let me be your housekeeper, girl
I qualify, baby
In the evening I can get your bathwater ready
Show you what you're worth
Let me be your housekeeper, girl

They say the man is supposed to be working
While the lady stays at home
I say a man really loves his woman when he's not afraid to show
How much he cares for her like I care for you and I love you too
Won't you let me show you, girl
I'll do it over and over

In the morning I can fix breakfast, baby
Get you ready for work
Let me be your house keeper, girl
I wanna be your house keeper
In the evening I can get your bathwater ready
Show you what you're worth
Let me be your house keeper, girl

Let me take good care of you, baby girl, yeah
I don't believe you hear me when I say I'd rather stay in the house
When yo come home from work let me show you what you deserve
And I'll give you all my time, to you I'll give my life
And I'll give you everything you need, anything you ask of me

Baby, I qualify, I qualify, I qualify
In the morning I can fix breakfast, baby
Get you ready for work
Let me be your housekeeper, girl
I wanna be your housekeeper
In the evening I can get your bathwater ready
Show you what you're worth
Let me be your house keeper, girl
Baby, I qualify

In the morning I can fix breakfast, baby
Get you ready for work
Let me be your housekeeper, girl
I'll cook and clean, I'll even do the windows
In the evening I can get your bathwater ready
Make this house a home, I'll never let you be alone
Show you what you're worth
Let me be your house keeper, girl
Let me be your housekeeper

In the morning I can fix breakfast, baby
Get you ready for work
Give me a nine to five, I'm working for you, baby
Let me be your housekeeper, girl
I'm working for you, baby
Cook and clean, I'll even be your sex machine
In the evening I can get your bathwater ready
Make this house a home, I'll never let you be alone
Show you what you're worth
Let me be your house and a home cleaner
